sentences.sContent: Sodium chloride is more commonly known as salt.

sentences.sCn: 一种常用的工业化学品

sentences.sContent: ...talking and listening are commonly used in communication...
...crying is more commonly associated with minor forms of depression than with major depression involving suicidal thoughts...
...more commonly seen in women than in men...
...shared meals and "mixing it up" is not something commonly done in Britain...
...There are many commonly held beliefs about eye glasses and eyesight that are not proven facts...
...He believes most diseases that commonly affect men could be addressed by preventive check-ups...

words.tran: 共同的；普通的；一般的；通常的
老生常谈；司空见惯的事；普通的东西
